channel.title: Beecroft Art Gallery on Artangled
channel.description: Recent content in Beecroft Art Gallery on Artangled

item.title: Top 5 of 2022
item.description: Another year, another 50 or so new posts about some art show I’d seen that week. Following the pandemic, which put a major dampener on the Artangled project, things are pretty much back to normal on here. That’s reflected by the numbers. I saw 220 exhibitions in total this past year, practically the same as 2019 (221) and well up from last year’s 141 - a drop almost entirely attributable to lockdowns.
